alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 10:43PM CDT until May 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR WILSON COUNTY... At 1043 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fredonia, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Neodesha, Fredonia, Altoona, Benedict and Buxton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
